name: AppWarp java sdk
tagline: Include the JAR files from the latest version and add use in your application
body:
AppWarp JAVA SDK
====================
[![OverView](http://appwarp.shephertz.com/images/appwarp_logo.png)](http://appwarp.shephertz.com)

Include the JAR files from the latest version and add use in your application

[![](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/61084350/SignUp.png)](https://apphq.shephertz.com/register?appwarp=true) [![](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/61084350/SignIn.png)](https://apphq.shephertz.com/) [![](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/61084350/DownloadSDK.png)](https://github.com/shephertz/AppWarp_JAVA_SDK_JAR/) [![](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/61084350/GetStarted.png)](https://github.com/shephertz/AppWarp_JAVA_SDK_JAR/wiki/Getting-Started) [![](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/61084350/ViewSample.png)](https://github.com/shephertz/AppWarp_JAVA_SDK_JAR/tree/master/Sample) [![](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/61084350/FAQ.png)](https://github.com/shephertz/AppWarp_JAVA_SDK_JAR/wiki/FAQ)

Sample
========
The sample illustrates how to set up a NetBeans project with the AppWarp SDK. It is a trivial Swing application which shows how user can join the app's zone, perform room operations
and chat/update rooms using the AppWarp APIs.
Please update the call to WarpClient.initialize with the Api and Secret key pair received while signing up.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
